message.original: ああ、覚者さま―― どうか今一度私を――
message.translation: We will always be together, Master!

message.original: 我らはいつも、覚者さまとともに
message.translation: The Rift is always with us.

message.original: 覚者さま、お力添えの機会 お待ちしています
message.translation: Master, I look forward to assisting you.

message.original: 覚者さま、どうぞ私にも同伴の許可を リムストーンからのお声掛けを お待ちしています
message.translation: Please allow me to accompany you, Master.

message.original: 冒険の手助けなら、いつでもいたします
message.translation: If you are in need of help on your adventure, we are here for you.

message.original: まだ、作業を承っておりません
message.translation: I have not recieved work yet.

message.original: ご指示をお待ちしています
旅かクラフトのご用命あらば いつでも動きます
message.translation: I will follow you in your travels. We can move at anytime.

message.original: 只今作業中ですので、お待ちください
message.translation: Please wait, as it is now under construction.

message.original: 完成まで、いましばらくかかります
message.translation: It will take time until it is complete.

message.original: 集中力を要しますので、会話はまた後ほど
message.translation: I can't talk now, I must concentrate.

message.original: 救っていただき、ありがとうございます 次こそは必ずお役に――！
message.translation: Thanks for rescuing me! I will do better next time!

message.original: 申し訳ありません、覚者さま 精進いたします
message.translation: I am truly sorry, Master. I will strive to be more diligent in the future.

message.original: 次こそご期待を―― この経験を生かします
message.translation: I'll make use of this experience. And meet your expectations next time.
